posts.post_content:
Another locus ([Glimmerpost](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glimmerpost)) is being printed in Scars of Mirrodin.  
  
If you have 4 of these, 4 Glimmerposts, and 4 Vesuva copies of these... Each of these would tap for 12, so that's 96 for all 8 Cloudposts. And another 4 for the Glimmerposts. 12 lands tapping for 100 mana? Yeah, sure, it's colorless, but it's also 100 mana.
posts.html:

Posted By: Andon_A (9/21/2010 10:52:10 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
He meant shapeshifter i.e. duplicant, because its colorless mana.. not because it affects lands.
  
   
Ah, cloud post.. bane of my creature deck's existence.. it wouldn't have been so bad if it said something like.. if you have another cloud post in play this land produces +1 colorless mana so that it would only be 2 per land at max. Unfortunately between cloud posts and vesuvas instead it turns into playing darksteel colossus on turn 5, or a fast master transmuter into a sphinx of the steel wind. Mirrodin made artifacts so nuts it seems like they have been making up for it for the past few sets by not printing very many. I mean.. seriously, isochron scepter, lightning greaves, duplicant, and loxodon warhammer all in the same set?
  
   
Having said all that, best card for artifacts decks you could want, makes just about anything castable when you have only 2 out.

Posted By: TheSwarm (10/3/2010 5:44:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I had no idea this card even existed. As a common that adds colorless and comes in tapped, it just flies under the radar...  
  
...until you play someone running a colorless deck with 4 of these, 4 Vesuvas and 4 Glimmerposts. Having 12 mana available on turn 4 (with a tapped land, meaning at least 16 next turn), JUST FROM LANDS, is ridiculous. Admittedly, it requires them to actually have multiple Locii, but even with 2 Cloudposts they're getting 4 mana from 2 lands. And it's not like colorless decks are super weak or anything. ^^

posts.post_content: Note, that having 12 Posts/Locii would probably actualy have been fair if we didn't have Amulet of Vigor. I think. Banned in Modern.  
  
Yet 8 post is still legal in pauper, and there are fewer decks to punish you for doing nothing in first few turns. Posted By: dberry02 (6/17/2011 4:27:37 PM)

posts.post_content:
My deck runs 4 Cloudpost, 4 [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), and a [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice) Then, instead of 64 colorless mana, I have 64 (Red, White, Blue, Black, Green in any combo) land! So you want [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker) out turn 4 with 8 spare mana of any color in reserve for creatures, well you got it.   
So, ideally it would go like so:  
Turn 1: Cloudpost  
Turn 2: [Amulet of Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amulet of Vigor ) , then Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), tap for 2 [Everflowing Chalice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Everflowing Chalice )  kicked 1 time  
Turn 3: Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice )   
Turn 4: Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), [Tooth and Nail](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tooth and Nail) for 9 searching for [Emrakul, the Aeons Torn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul, the Aeons Torn) and [Blightsteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Colossus), and you still have enough for a planeswalker such as [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker), or just burn with something like [Comet Sto](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Comet Sto)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

So, ideally it would go like so:
Turn 1: Cloudpost
Turn 2: Amulet of Vigor , then Cloudpost or Vesuva, tap for 2 Everflowing Chalice kicked 1 time
Turn 3: Cloudpost or Vesuva, Mycosynth Lattice
Turn 4: Cloudpost or Vesuva, Tooth and Nail for 9 searching for Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Blightsteel Colossus, and you still have enough for a planeswalker such as Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker, or just burn with something like Comet Sto... (see all)
